name: cypress-cucumber-boilerplate
description: This project is meant to be a kind of template to start working with Cucumber and Cypress just cloning the project.

scripts.clone:r: NO_COLOR=1 node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/cypress run --record --key 502169c2-2ab6-4bcc-b6d2-9b537cfe96ae --e2e --browser electron dotenv_config_path=./.clone.env
scripts.ext5:r: NO_COLOR=1 node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/cypress run dotenv_config_path=./.ext5.env --record --key 502169c2-2ab6-4bcc-b6d2-9b537cfe96ae --e2e --browser electron

author: cucumber
